metadata.title: CVE-2020-17368 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Firejail through 0.9.62 mishandles shell metacharacters during use of the--output or --output-stderr option, which may lead to command injection.

criterions.comment: firejail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
